messages.subject: Re: Commercial message, Tsuba related
messages.msgSnippet: Dear every one, thank you to those who has answered me, supported me and many etc. Every thing goes perfect. By the way, I reduce to the half most of my
messages.messageBody:
Dear every one, thank you to those who has answered me, supported me and
many etc.
Every thing goes perfect.
By the way, I reduce to the half most of my tsubas.
Once again thanks to all those that have written to me
Máximo

PS. there are not any tsuba with nanako and tekkotsu?
Tekkotsu means soft iron goes away and hard steel remains?

Máximo D. Marchionni
www.maximom.com.ar
Maximo@...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Maximo" <maximo@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2006 4:20 AM
Subject: Commercial message, Tsuba related


> For personal reason (an operation) I have to sale my tsuba collection,
that
> mean http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm Nº1, Nº2, Nº4,
Nº5,
> Nº6, Nº7, Nº8, Nº9 and Nº10, all for U$D 7,300.- plus shipment. If some
one
> has interested please send me a mail to maximo@..., any way....
I
> will try to take a bank loan. I don´t wish to sale them but if I can not
get
> the bank loan, I will. This offer will be still march 16, 2006. after that
> day I will not need sale them.
> Thank you very much.
> Máximo
>
> Máximo D. Marchionni
> www.maximom.com.ar
> Maximo@...
>

messages.subject: Commercial message, Tsuba related
messages.msgSnippet: For personal reason (an operation) I have to sale my tsuba collection, that mean http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm Nº1, Nº2, Nº4, Nº5,
messages.messageBody:
For personal reason (an operation) I have to sale my tsuba collection, that
mean http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm Nº1, Nº2, Nº4, Nº5,
Nº6, Nº7, Nº8, Nº9 and Nº10, all for U$D 7,300.- plus shipment. If some one
has interested please send me a mail to maximo@..., any way.... I
will try to take a bank loan. I don´t wish to sale them but if I can not get
the bank loan, I will. This offer will be still march 16, 2006. after that
day I will not need sale them.
Thank you very much.
Máximo

Máximo D. Marchionni
www.maximom.com.ar
Maximo@...
